content: on the clover-us blog a free pattern for the friendship belt is being featured visit their blog by clicking this ** link 1 ** skill level beginner friendly - intermediate materials worsted weight #4 cotton yarn approximately 75 yards crochet hook size 4 5 mm or size to obtain gauge scissors darning needle tape measure stitch markers gauge 4 5 chains of circle-clusters = 4 inches see round 1 finished measurement 32 length x 1 5 width inches with 36 clusters excluding the strings stitches and abbreviations | us terminology chain s chain s double_crochet double_crochet pm place marker prev - previous repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch s slip_stitch es space s space s st s stitch es special stitches double_crochet-cluster 2 double_crochet cluster yarn over insert hook in a st/space yarn over pull through a st yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook yarn over insert hook in the same st/space yarn over pull through a st yarn over pull through 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through all 3 loops on hook notes 1 read the pattern carefully before starting 2 this pattern is worked flat in the rounds 3 since this is a made-to-measure pattern gauge is not so important take your measurement before beginning determine whether you want your belt to sit just above your hipbones or on your waist it is up to you which option you choose 4 * * repeat instructions between asterisks as many times as directed or repeat at specified locations 5 work instructions within parentheses as many times as directed or work a group of stitches all in the same stitch or space 6 i recommend using stitch markers to mark specified stitches remember to move the stitch marker as you progress 7 it is entirely up to you how long your belt strings are to lengthen or shorten the strings simply add or subtract the specified number of chains i would love to see your friendship belt version please tag me @stringsandcuddles and use these hashtags to share #stringsandcuddles #stringsandcuddlesdesigns #friendshipbelt please don t hesitate to reach out with questions regarding this pattern do not forget to visit my ravelry shop to check out my other patterns 1 https //blog clover-usa com/2024/04/09/friendship-belt-crochet-pattern/
